QuestData.Title: Fly Over
QuestData.Description: I tried ta fly o'er the terrace an have a look fer myself, but those toastie eatin' pansies kept shootin' at me, an I couldn't get near.$B$BYa look like ya might be handy with the reins. Why don' ya take yer flyin' beastie up there ta the southwest and see what all the fuss is about?
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the central area in the back of the Masters' Gate.
QuestData.CompletionText: What'd ya see? What are those cheese lovers up ta?
QuestData.RewardText: A waygate?! The culties dug up a Titan waygate?
